name: VATeir Holding Page
body:
![vateir logo](http://vateir.tk/images/logo.png)

### VATeir Forums Downtime.
Folks - The forums are currently being migrated to the servers of peter richards. A snapshot of the forums was made at 15h05 today Saturday, 8th of June 2013. The forums will be down until such a time as the forums are restored on the new servers.

We apologize for the inconvenience, sit tight and enjoy the sunny day.

Best Regards
VATeir Technical
Colin
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
